name: Defense Evasion - Time Based Evasion (T1497.003)
description: Detects attempts to evade sandbox by delaying execution or measuring execution time to detect virtualized environments.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.args:(*Sleep* OR *SetTimer* OR *NtDelayExecution* OR *QueryPerformanceCounter* OR *GetTickCount* OR *time delta* OR *sleep 300000*)
